title: War in Ukraine Likely to Speed, Not Slow, Shift to Clean Energy, I.E.A. Says
description: While some nations are burning more coal this year in response to natural-gas shortages spurred by Russiaâ€™s invasion of Ukraine, that effect is expected to be short-lived.
